title: Article 1 - Provision of Social Services-general
content:
Article 1 - Provision of Social Services-general

State Regulations

Part 400 - Scope of Social Services Program (§ 400.1 to 400.2)

Part 401 - Comprehensive Annual Social Services Program Plan (§ 401.1 to 401.7)

Part 402 - Organizational Requirements for Social Services (§ 402.1 to 402.6)

Part 403 - Program Requirements for Social Services (§ 403.1 to 403.9)

Part 404 - Determination and Redetermination of Eligibility For Social Services (§ 404.1 to 404.8)

Part 405 - Purchase of Services by Social Services District (§ 405.1 to 405.5)

Part 406 - Recording and Reporting Requirements for Social Services Programs (§ 406.1 to 406.4)

Part 407 - Consolidated Services Plan (§ 407.1 to 407.11)

Part 408 - Standards for Establishing Per Diem Rates and Social Services District Payment Responsibility for Residential Programs for Victims of Domestic Violence (§ 408.1 to 408.8)

Part 409 - Limits On Administrative Expenses And Executive Compensation (Repealed) (§ 409.1 to 409.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
